name: Demon Chicken
description:
You have came back to the mortal plane but with one mistake...

You have chosen to come back in a chickens body, this vessel cannot hold you for long so you need a constant stream of souls!!!

Unleash your wrath upon the animals in the forest, and show em true fear!!

//Controls//

WASD - Move

LEFT MOUSE BUTTON - Eat

SPACE/ENTER - Continue
